enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: BUILDING BLOCKS - COP AND SB SESSIONS, WORKSHOPS AND CONSTITUTED BODIES: Chair Sach outlined the issues for consideration, including: whether the 'building blocks' of the process are sufficiently robust; the frequency of COP and SB sessions; organization of high-level segments beyond COP-10; in-session arrangements; functioning of the process; and whether the process is achieving results commensurate with its costs.
